short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Scrapeo extension allows you to scrape content from websites from multiple pages and easily export it to your favorite format.
short.fr: L’extension Scrapeo vous permet d’extraire le contenu de sites web et de l’exporter facilement dans le format de votre choix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The scrapeo extension is a powerfull scraping tool to extract data from websites quickly and easily. It has been designed to be user-friendly so that anyone can use it and no technical knowledge is required. Try it today and let us know what you think!
long.fr,sv: The scrapeo extension is a powerfull tool to scrape websites quickly and easily. It has been designed to be user-friendly so that anyone can use it and no technical knowledge is required. Try it today and let us know what you think!
